trans-unit.source: Describes how a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> repeats its simple duration.
trans-unit.target: 描述如何<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref>重複其簡單的持續時間。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"></xref> structure with the specified iteration count.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"></xref>結構指定的反覆項目計數。

trans-unit.source: A number greater than or equal to 0 that specifies the number of iterations to make.
trans-unit.target: 數字大於或等於 0，指定要反覆項目數目。

trans-unit.source: count evaluates to infinity, a value that is not a number, or is negative.
trans-unit.target: count評估為值，不是數字，或為負的無限大。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"></xref> structure with the specified repeat duration.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"></xref>結構，以指定重複的持續時間。

trans-unit.source: The total length of time that the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> should play (its active duration).
trans-unit.target: 時間的總長度<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref>應該播放 （其使用中的持續時間）。

trans-unit.source: duration evaluates to a negative number.
trans-unit.target: duration評估結果為負數值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of times a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> should repeat.
trans-unit.target: 取得次數<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref>應該重複。

trans-unit.source: To avoid throwing an exception when accessing this property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.HasCount%2A> property first to verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior> represents an iteration count, not a repeat duration.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免擲回例外狀況，存取這個屬性時，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.HasCount%2A>屬性第一次，可讓您確認<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior>代表反覆項目計數，不重複的持續時間。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.HasCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about making a timeline repeat, see the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需建立重複的時間軸的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The numeric value representing the number of iterations to repeat.
trans-unit.target: 數字的值，表示重複的反覆項目數。

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"></xref> describes a repeat duration, not an iteration count.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"></xref>描述重複的持續時間，不是反覆項目計數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total length of time a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> should play.
trans-unit.target: 取得時間的總長度<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref>應該播放。

trans-unit.source: To avoid throwing an exception when accessing this property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.HasDuration%2A> property first to verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior> represents a repeat duration.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免擲回例外狀況，存取這個屬性時，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.HasDuration%2A>屬性第一次，可讓您確認<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior>代表重複的持續時間。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.HasDuration%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about making a timeline repeat, see the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需建立重複的時間軸的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The total length of time a timeline should play.
trans-unit.target: 時間軸應該播放的時間總長度。

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"></xref> does not describe a repeat duration; it describes an iteration count.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"></xref>不會描述重複的持續時間; 它描述反覆項目計數。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this instance is equal to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 指出這個執行個體是否等於指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with this instance.
trans-unit.target: 要與這個執行個體比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: if value is a that represents the same repeat behavior as this instance; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 value 是代表相同的重複行為與這個執行個體; 否則 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this instance is equal to the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出這個執行個體是否等於指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value to compare to this instance.
trans-unit.target: 要與這個執行個體比較的值。

trans-unit.source: if both the type and repeat behavior of repeatBehavior are equal to this instance; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果型別和重複行為 repeatBehavior 等於這個執行個體，否則 。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the two specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"></xref> structures are equal.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否兩個指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"></xref>結構是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The first value to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個值。

trans-unit.source: The second value to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個值。

trans-unit.source: if both the type and repeat behavior of repeatBehavior1 are equal to that of repeatBehavior2; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果型別和重複行為 repeatBehavior1 相等的 repeatBehavior2 ，否則 。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"></xref> that specifies an infinite number of repetitions.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"> </xref> ，指定無限重複次數。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"></xref> that specifies an infinite number of repetitions.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"> </xref> ，指定無限重複次數。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the repeat behavior has a specified iteration count.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否重複行為具有指定的反覆項目計數。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified type refers to an iteration count; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的型別參考反覆項目計數。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the repeat behavior has a specified repeat duration.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否指定重複的持續時間的重複行為。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified type refers to a repeat duration; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的型別是指重複的持續時間。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the two specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"></xref> instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否兩個指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"></xref>執行個體會相等。

trans-unit.source: The first value to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個值。

trans-unit.source: The second value to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個值。

trans-unit.source: if both the type and repeat behavior of repeatBehavior1 are equal to that of repeatBehavior2; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果型別和重複行為 repeatBehavior1 相等的 repeatBehavior2 ，否則 。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the two <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"></xref> instances are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否兩個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"></xref>執行個體是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: The first value to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個值。

trans-unit.source: The second value to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個值。

trans-unit.source: if repeatBehavior1 and repeatBehavior2 are different types or the repeat behavior properties are not equal; otherwise .
trans-unit.target: 如果 repeatBehavior1 和 repeatBehavior2 不同類型或重複行為屬性不相等，否則 。

trans-unit.source: Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 目前的執行個體使用指定的格式將值格式化。

trans-unit.source: The format to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的格式。

trans-unit.source: -or- A null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the <xref:System.IFormattable> implementation.
trans-unit.target: -null 參考 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中) 若要使用的類型所定義的預設格式<xref:System.IFormattable>實作。</xref:System.IFormattable>

trans-unit.source: The provider to use to format the value.
trans-unit.target: 要用來格式化值提供者。

trans-unit.source: -or- A null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: -null 參考 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中) 從目前的地區設定的作業系統取得的數值格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: The value of the current instance in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 目前的執行個體中指定的格式的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個字串表示<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"></xref> instance with the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個字串表示<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"></xref>的執行個體與指定的格式。

trans-unit.source: The format used to construct the return value.
trans-unit.target: 用來建構的傳回值的格式。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體的字串表示。
